title: Will links posted to the old Made With Unity site still work?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I have added links to my Made With Unity profile/ content on other sites
  • Since MWU is migrating to Unity Connect, I am concerned these links will no longer direct properly

sections.title: Cause
content: As of September 2017, Made With Unity will be part of the Unity Connect site and operating under a different URL.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Links from Made With Unity automatically redirect to your new page on Unity Connect
